profile.heading: Current Release Front-End Projects
profile.portfolio_desc: Here are some of my latest Front-End Projects
elavator_pitch: I am an IT Engineer, turned Full-Stack JavaScript Developer.
I enjoy creating, enhancing, debugging websites and web apps. I design front-end user-interfaces and building back-end servers.
From data-validation, user-sign-on, data-encryption to progressive-enhancement of web-pages, I got the skills you need to make your vision come alive.
